title: Run 8 Train Simulator (Including DLC Add-ons)
description:
=============================
Run 8 Train Simulator
=============================

This is a full release of the PC game "Run 8 Train Simulator". It includes the main program itself, its latest upgrade to date (Version 12.16.2015), as well as all DLC that was released for it up to April of 2015!

The game doesn't require any type of activation or registration. Just be sure to read the installation instructions below and you're off!

---------------
Game Details:
---------------
Game: Run 8 Train Simulator
Genre: Simulation
Developer: Run 8 Studios, LTD / 3D Train Stuff, LLC
Release Date: August 23rd, 2012 (Original) / December 16th, 2015 (Latest)
Platform: PC
Publisher: Run 8 Studios
Publication Type: Installer
Language: English
Official Site: www.run8studios.com

---------------
Game Description:
---------------
In Run 8 Train Simulator, whether you're an average gamer or a hard-core rail-enthusiast, you can take the controls of several prototypical freight and passenger trains! With superior physics and operational capabilities, as well as a 

variety of routes and rolling stock, Run 8 offers many features no other train simulator is capable of!

Gamers can also expand their railroading experience with more additional content (DLC) that can be acquired via run8studios.com! By merging multiple routes, players can seamlessly travel up to 300 miles around Southern California with 

scenery ranging from the Tehachapi mountains, the Mojave Desert, and also the city of San Bernardino via Cajon Pass on your train!

One of Run 8's most anticipated features is its multi-player mode, in which dozens of users can join and participate in the game's environment! Players can organize multiple sessions as an engineer, conductor, dispatcher, yard master, 

yard switcher, and more!

More information about Run 8 Train Simulator and its features is at the product's homepage at: www.run8studios.com

---------------
Game Features:
---------------
- Single-Player and Multi-Player modes
- Prototypical train and handling physics
- Highly-detailed models and cab interiors
- Realistic operations, including working defect detectors, yard humping, and DPUs.
- Mergeable DLC routes providing 300 miles of seamless travel around Southern California
- RailDriverÂ® Desktop Controller supported (raildriver.com)

---------------
System Requirements:
---------------
Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, and 10. / MAC with VMware.
Processor: Dual Core 2.5 GHz
Memory: 3GB RAM
Storage: Minimum 800MB (Base Program Only) / Recommended 3GB (For DLC)
Video: GeForce GT 440 with 1GB RAM
Software: Microsoft XNA Framework 3.1 (Included) / Microsoft .Net 3.5
Controls: Keyboard and Mouse

---------------
Installation Instructions:
---------------
- Step 1: Install the main program, "r8_bnsfmojave_sub_v12.exe", from the parent folder.

** IMPORTANT: If you installed Run 8 to another path other than the default, make sure to point all further installers below to the very same path where Run 8 is! **

- Step 2: Install the "run8_upgrade_121615-full.exe" program update from the "Run8 12.16.15 Update" sub-folder.

- Step 3: If your system doesn't have it, install Microsoft XNA Framework 3.1 (xnafx31_redist.msi) from the game's main directory you just installed to. (*Installation PathRun 8 Studios/Run 8 Train Simulator/xnafx31_redist.msi)

- Step 4 (Optional): If wanted, install all or preferred DLC from respective sub-folders. (Note that DLC routes also have their own updates in the "Run8 Route Updates" sub-folder!)

- Step 5 (Optional): If you wish to enable multi-player, start the game and load up any route, bring up the options menu (Press F1), click "Others" tab, and enter a random 10-digit number in the "Registration" box. Multi-player feature 

should enable!

- And that's all, have fun!

(Also, it may help to read the included "Run8 Basics and Tutorials" folder. This is a very robust simulator and might require a bit of learning on the first time!)

---------------
